A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It is as if the writer hadn't seen the previous movie\, let alone the original trilogy. Not only did this movie utterly demolish any buildup created by The Force Awakens\, it also maliciously develops previously established characters into either idiotic or sinister character arcs. Watch the Scoundrel's Cantina review\, as they have succinctly transformed my hatred for this film into an undeservedly more dignified critique. Long story short\, this film was a dumpster fire.
